DOC.HEADLINE: HORSES NOT DONATED
DOC.TEXT: In reference_to a story Feb . 6 about 11 starving horses " donated " to the Humane Society Shelter : To donate is to make a gift of , or to contribute to , a public or charitable cause . These horses are not a gift or contribution to the Humane Society of Ventura County . California state humane officers went_to the Warner Ranch with a search_warrant and seized these abused animals as evidence . The animals were placed in protective custody and brought_to the Humane Society Shelter . Mrs . Warner agreed to sign the animals over to the Humane Society to avoid prosecution . The Humane Society of Ventura County is a nonprofit organization that receives no federal , state , county or city funding . We welcome donations . Jolene Hoffman Ojai Jolene Hoffman is shelter director of the Humane Society of Ventura County .
